Title: Potage
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), David Fury (teleplay by), Chris Brancato (teleplay by), Bryan Fuller (teleplay), David Fury (story by)
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: Determined to give Abigail closure, Will and Hannibal take Abigail back to the scene of her father's crimes. But things take a turn for the worse when the copycat killer strikes again.
